title: Suttum Sudar Vizhi Lyrics Siraichalai
stanzas:
Suttum Sudar Vizhi Lyrics Siraichalai

suttum sudar vizhi 
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai 
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi. (2)

nilavai pottum vaithu
pavala pattum katti
arugil nirkkum unnai
varavaerppen naan
varavaerppen naan

chiththira poove
pakkam vara 
sindhikkalaamaa.
mannanai ingae
thallivaithu thandikkalaamaa

suttum sudar vizhi 
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai 
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi. 

unadhu peyare mandhiram
ena oadhuven oadhuven
minminigalil nam ninaivinai
thaeduvaen thaeduvaen (2)

sandhangalil nanaiyuthe
mounangal thaagamaai.
mannan mugam thondri varum
kannile deepamaai

indrum unai naan
paaduven geethanjaliyaai
uyire uyire 
priyamae sagi. 

suttum sudar vizhi
naal muzhudhum 
thoongaliye kannaa

thanga nilavukku 
aariraaro paada vandhen 
kannae. 

iru vizhigalil
uyir vazhiyuthu
oomaiyaai oomaiyaai.
ulmadiyinil malar
vizhunthadhu sogamaai
sogamaai. (2)

vinnulagam eriyuthe
pournami thaangumaa
indru enthan sooriyan
kaalaiyil thoongumo.

kanavil unai naan
serndhida imaiye thadaiyaa
virindhaal siragai
ingu siluvaiyaa. 

suttum sudar vizhi 
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai 
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi. (2)

nilavai pottum vaithu
pavala pattum katti
arugil nirkkum unnai
varavaerppen naan
varavaerppen naan

suttum sudar vizhi 
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai 
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi (2)
